# Virtual Environment Setup Guide for Detectron2

### Detectron2 Requirments

- **Python 3.12.X**
- **Torch/TorchVision**
- **CUDA 12**
```{.python .custom-code}
!pip3 install torch torchvision --index-url https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu129
```

### Create Virtual Environment
```{.bash .custom-code}
py -3.12 -m venv env_name
```

### Activate Virtual Environment
```{.bash .custom-code}
env_name\Scripts\activate
```
If you see **(env_name)** in your prompt, the activation is successful.

### Connect to VS Code
- Press Ctrl + Shift + P â†’ type Python: Select Interpreter
- Choose: env_name/Scripts/python.exe


### Install Detectron2
```{.python .custom-code}
!pip install --no-build-isolation git+https://github.com/facebookresearch/detectron2.git
```

```{.python}
# Check
import torch, detectron2
print("torch version:", torch.__version__)
print("CUDA available:", torch.cuda.is_available())
print("torch CUDA version:", torch.version.cuda)
print("cuDNN version:", torch.backends.cudnn.version())
print("detectron2:", detectron2.__version__)
```
